doc.field: GERMAN MARCH COST OF LIVING DATA CONFIRMED

- The cost of living was unchanged in March compared with February but stood 0.2 pct lower than in the same month in 1986, the Federal Statistics Office said. This confirms provisional figures released at the end of last month. In February the cost of living in West Germany rose 0.1 pct from January to stand 0.5 pct lower than in February 1986.
